column5: I avoid going out of my room until really late at night so I don’t have to bother anyone with my existence
the other night I had a few friends over and they all eventually left me alone within the first hour, I don’t mean to ruin people’s days, but I swear every time im around someone I do.
currently having a mental breakdown in a friends bathroom because i have once again accidentally started a fight with my girlfriend and I have no idea why I can’t help myself from doing it
